@graph.caption: Single serving of vegetable soup in a white bowl set over a white plate. Set on a dark wooden table with a red napkin to the side.

@graph.name: Vegetable Soup - Cooking Classy
@graph.description: This Vegetable Soup has become one of my most popular soup recipes and for good reason! It's healthy, it's comforting and it's so much better than canned!

@graph.name: Vegetable Soup
@graph.description: This Vegetable Soup has become one of my most popular soup recipes and for good reason! It's healthy, it's comforting and 1,000 times better than what you'll get in a can! Makes 15 cups.

video.name: Vegetable Soup
video.description: Vegetable Soup - This Vegetable Soup has become one of my most popular soup recipes and for good reason! It’s healthy, it’s comforting and 1,000 times better than what you’ll get in a can!

recipeIngredient: 4 (14.5 oz) cans low-sodium chicken broth or vegetable broth
3 cups peeled and 1/2-inch thick diced potatoes ((from about 3 medium))
1/2 tsp dried thyme, (or 1 Tbsp fresh thyme leaves)
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 1/2 cups chopped frozen or fresh green beans

recipeInstructions.text: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium-high heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium-high heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add onions, carrots, and celery and saute 4 minutes then add garlic and saute 30 seconds longer.
recipeInstructions.name: Add onions, carrots, and celery and saute 4 minutes then add garlic and saute 30 seconds longer.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in broth, tomatoes, potatoes, parsley, bay leaves, thyme and season with salt and pepper to taste.*
recipeInstructions.name: Add in broth, tomatoes, potatoes, parsley, bay leaves, thyme and season with salt and pepper to taste.*

recipeInstructions.text: Bring to a boil, then add green beans.
recipeInstructions.name: Bring to a boil, then add green beans.

recipeInstructions.text: Reduce heat to medium-low, cover and simmer until potatoes are almost fully tender, about 20 - 30 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Reduce heat to medium-low, cover and simmer until potatoes are almost fully tender, about 20 - 30 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add corn and peas and cook 5 minutes longer. Serve warm.
recipeInstructions.name: Add corn and peas and cook 5 minutes longer. Serve warm.
